arts.ttl: “It does make me laugh” – Chris Wilder hits back at formation talk following the Blades’ defeat at Elland Road
arts.sum: Sheffield United suffered their first defeat of the season on Friday night, as Leeds United emerged 2-0 victors in a commanding display at Elland Road. The Blades struggled to match Leeds’ intensity and quality, leading to a deserved defeat in what was a one-sided affair. arts.ttl: Struijk cracker as Leeds beat Blades in Yorkshire derby
arts.sum: Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Leeds United and Sheffield United.

arts.ttl: Leeds United January transfer priority identified after 10 matches of Championship season
arts.sum: Brian Deane remains optimistic over Leeds United's promotion prospects this season. Yet the Whites, who entertained Sheffield United last night, remain firmly in the promotion mix and Deane has tipped them to go up following their play-off disappointment last time around.

arts.ttl: George Baldock: Sheffield United and Leeds pay emotional tribute to defender after death aged 31
arts.sum: Championship rivals join together to remember the former Blades full-back, who died in Athens last week

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke press conference LIVE as Leeds United boss reacts to stellar home win over Sheff Utd
arts.sum: Follow everything the manager has to say about Friday night's match below as we bring you most of the questions and answers in full from the debrief. Before the match, Farke made no changes to the side that drew with Sunderland two weeks ago.

arts.ttl: Leeds United 2-0 Sheffield United: Blades completely outclassed in Yorkshire derby
arts.sum: Sheffield United were comfortably the second-best team at Elland Road on Friday night as Leeds United claimed three points with a 2-0 win, and the Blades tasted defeat for the first time. arts.ttl: Chris Wilder pulls no punches after Sheffield United's loss at Leeds United
arts.sum: Chris Wilder paid a huge compliment to Leeds United after seeing his Sheffield United lose 2-0 at Elland Road tonight, labelling the Whites as the "best side they have faced" this season. arts.ttl: Daniel Farke addresses Leeds United 'curse' after 'complicated' Sheffield United victory
arts.sum: Farke told Sky Sports that he is a "big believer" in set pieces and and felt a goal from a dead ball situation was "coming". On their performance, Farke said: "It was a complicated game and we had to be switched on.

arts.ttl: Leeds end Sheffield United’s unbeaten start with victory at Elland Road
arts.sum: Daniel Farke’s side leap-frogged the visitors into second place in the Sky Bet Championship table.

arts.ttl: Leeds end Sheff Utd's unbeaten start to move second
arts.sum: Leeds ended Sheffield United's unbeaten start to the season and moved second in the Championship table after a 2-0 win at Elland Road on Friday night.
